<title level="1" right="Focus 1" pfs="Standard">
[Delay Consequence](/Spells.aspx?ID=2415)
<actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 270

**Domain**
[Time](/Domains.aspx?ID=121)

<row gap="medium">

 

**Trigger** A creature or object within range is hit by an [attack](/Traits.aspx?ID=540).

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** the triggering creature or object
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 round
</row>

</column>

---

You transpose the moment that the target would be injured to a point later in its timestream. Roll damage normally, but do not reduce Hit Points or apply any other effects of the attack until the spell’s duration has elapsed. When the spell ends, the target is immediately affected by the attack, taking damage and being affected by any additional effects. You can [Dismiss](/Actions.aspx?ID=2311) this spell.
name: Delay Consequence
